title: Bloomberg Markets: Putnam CEO on 'From Here to Security'

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Robert Reynolds\u0010CEO \u0010Putnam Investments\u0010Discussing his book "From Here to Security" on workplace savings and retirment.
